name: College Gay Sex - Episode 1
description:
An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD graphics, steamy ANIMATIONS, and realistic-looking characters.
Meet Cody and embark on his wild journey as a gay college student.
Episode 1 finds him horny and bored in his new room at the shared house. Luckily, his hot bisexual housemate walks in, setting the stage for an exciting night. They end up having sex on the bed after a steamy foreplay in the shower.

GAME DESCRIPTION

Meet Cody and embark on his wild journey as a gay college student.

EPISODE 1
A new college year is about to kick off, and Cody is ready for it.
He packs his bags and moves into his new room at the shared house, eager to celebrate with his housemates.
Imagine his disappointment when he arrives to find he's the only one at home, with no chance for a housewarming party. Luckily, his hot bisexual neighbor surprises him with a knock on the door, setting the stage for a more exciting night.
Horny and turned on by Jax, Cody uses the opportunity of a steamy shower to seduce him. He leaves the door open and brazenly starts touching himself, hoping to stir something in Jax.

Will Cody convince Jax to join him in the shower?
Follow the story and find out!

FEATURES

- HD renders and animations
- Video and image gallery
